tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: we had to wait for over an hour to meet dr sapna. first we were made to sit down and talk to a junior doctor to brief our issues and then after lot of waiting the doc arrived. in short, she barely spoke, directly jumped into conclusion without any explanation, sounded very unfriendly. went to a doctor for guidance but left the clinic with a mental breakdown. the point where I lost it was when i responded to whatever she had to say with an "okay" as i was expecting her to say something more, and as a natural response. to which she responds "what okay??". never have I seen such a rude/apathetic doctor. i lost interest in that place and her after losing patience for an hour waiting to deal with such attitude. would never set foot here ever again or want to meet that doctor or recommend her to anyone. just want to forget this like a bad dream.

the consultation was for my wife as she was having some health issue the doctor was very **** * co-operative I am satisfied with the consultation my wife is doing fine now faced some issue at the hospital as there was a long waiting time rather than that it was all good

I booked the appointment for myself as I having a severe stomach pain after my delivery so the doctor prescribed me DOLO 650  ***** *** *** ******** ***** ****** *** ****** **** ** ******* ********* then I had to consult my doctor *** ********* ** ****  ** ** ********* ** **** **** *** ********* * **** the hospital had lot of waiting time the hospital was not systematic

the consultation was for myself it was a pregnancy related consultation  the doctor understood my problem exactly t that she gave me the medications she was very supportive & polite there was no issue at the hospital as well there was no much waiting time I am satisfied with the consultation
